title: The Ark Captured by the Philistines
summary: 1 Samuel 4 recounts a devastating defeat for Israel. The Ark of the Covenant is brought into battle like a good-luck charm but is captured by the Philistines. Eliâ€™s sons are killed, and Eli dies upon hearing the news.

faq.question: What mistake did Israel make in battle?
faq.answer: They treated the Ark like a magical object, thinking it would guarantee victory.

faq.question: What happened to Eli and his sons?
faq.answer: His sons were killed in battle, and Eli died from shock after hearing the Ark was taken.
